turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place a Starbucks order for pickup, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a venti cappuccino with 2%, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place that order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have ordered a venti cappuccino with 2% milk to be picked up at westlake starbucks in daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your order should be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
